data.title: Dandy case study
data.snippet:
"Google Cloud offers a tool for everything we need. Instead of going through lengthy, costly onboarding processes for another SaaS solution, we just go through Google, or spin up the open-source dependency in one of our GKE clusters," says Pierce.

# Drilling into detail

Alongside Google Cloud Logging, which records specific system events, Dandy needed a dedicated observability solution to monitor tracing and metrics and further improve the quality and reliability of its software service.

Choosing Chronosphere, a Google Cloud partner, was a clear decision. "Chronosphere is built from the ground up to work with Google Cloud. We can get all our Google-native metrics into Chronosphere, and engineers no longer need to jump back and forth between tools." [...] Best of all, Dandy is now equipped to meet fast-growing demand for its ground-breaking digital dental services. By the end of 2024, 75 percent of US dental practices will have adopted a digital model for check-ups, scanning, and fixture manufacturing. "There are more than 180,000 dental practices in the US," says Pierce. "With Google Cloud and Chronosphere, we are well positioned to rise up to this opportunity while providing vastly improved patient and dentist experiences."

Dandy, the digital dental lab, empowers thousands of dental practices with innovative technologies to advance patient care and revolutionize the way they scan, order, and manage casework. With Dandy, clinicians have delivered happy smiles to over 1.5M patients with enhanced control and predictability. [...] As a fast-moving start up, Dandy was impressed by the pace of innovation set by Chronosphere. Pierce says that every couple of weeks brings a new improvement to the solution. "One week it was a new menu bar, the next it was a new trace explorer. I'm always excited before our weekly syncs because I want to know what kind of enhancements are coming our way," he says.

data.snippet:
‚úÖ Google Workspace / Gmail Backup Solutions ‚Äì Secure your critical emails with automated backups.

### ‚ö° DevOps Solutions ‚Äì Automate & Optimize Your Infrastructure

‚úÖ Cloud Infrastructure Setup ‚Äì Scalable solutions on Google Cloud & more.

‚úÖ CI/CD Pipeline Implementation ‚Äì Automate deployments for faster delivery.

‚úÖ Containerization & Kubernetes ‚Äì Optimize workload management with Docker & Kubernetes.

‚úÖ Infrastructure as Code (IaC) ‚Äì Automate infrastructure with Terraform & Ansible.

‚úÖ Monitoring & Logging ‚Äì Real-time insights with Prometheus, Grafana & ELK Stack.

‚úÖ Security & Compliance ‚Äì Secure your cloud with industry best practices.

‚úÖ Cost Optimization ‚Äì Reduce cloud costs while improving performance.

### üõ°Ô∏è Cloud Security & Compliance Solutions [...] ### üõ°Ô∏è Cloud Security & Compliance Solutions

‚úÖ ISO 27001 Compliance ‚Äì Implement and maintain an ISMS for cloud security.

‚úÖ GDPR Compliance ‚Äì Ensure data protection and privacy for EU customers.

‚úÖ PCI DSS Compliance ‚Äì Secure payment transactions and protect cardholder data.

‚úÖ SOC 2 Compliance ‚Äì Meet trust service criteria for cloud-based services.

‚úÖ HIPAA Compliance ‚Äì Protect sensitive healthcare information.

‚úÖ Data Encryption & Access Control ‚Äì Secure cloud environments with industry best practices.

‚úÖ Cloud Security Audits ‚Äì Identify vulnerabilities and strengthen cloud security posture.

### üîç VAPT (Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing) for Web Applications

‚úÖ Comprehensive Web App Security Testing ‚Äì Identify and eliminate vulnerabilities. [...] ‚úÖ Automated & Manual Penetration Testing ‚Äì In-depth testing to uncover hidden threats.

‚úÖ OWASP Top 10 & SANS 25 Compliance ‚Äì Secure applications against common exploits.

‚úÖ API Security Testing ‚Äì Ensure your APIs are protected against attacks.

‚úÖ Source Code Review ‚Äì Identify security loopholes in your application code.

‚úÖ Remediation Guidance & Retesting ‚Äì Actionable insights and validation after fixes.

### ‚úÖ Compliance-Oriented Testing ‚Äì Meet industry standards like ISO 27001, PCI DSS & GDPR.

 Example ¬∂

```
